availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer. Indiana native. Son of John Houze and Sarah Houze. Married to Margaret M. Wainscott Houze in Indiana on October 8, 1859. Farmer in Switzerland County, Indiana in 1860. Served in 83rd Indiana Infantry (U.S.A.) as private.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Switzerland County, Posey, p. 447A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Switzerland County, Posey, p. 21.
Indiana Marriages, 1810-2001FHL Film #001310441, p. 89 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Indiana, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M540, Roll 0036.
